projects.title: Weatheria
projects.bodyText:
- Weather app that displays the climate conditions based on their search input using open weather API.
 - Search functionality to search up cities via the search bar to look for weather conditions.
 - A React JS Web application.

projects.title: Our Recipes
projects.bodyText:
- An AllRecipes clone React based Web Application.
 - Search functionality to search up ingredients & recipe titles

projects.title: Survey Site
projects.bodyText:
- Survey App is a MEAN stack based Web-Application. 
 -  Allows Users to create their own surveys and have control over their answers.
 - This  tool delivers a complete survey, user management,and encryption system to protect your data

projects.title: F1 Gallery
projects.bodyText:
- A Javascript app that allows you to pick your favorite F1 Car for display.
 - Uses favorite bar to display pictures of your own liking.

projects.title: Bank Account App
projects.bodyText:
- A Windows forms App that registers an account for a user.
 - C# based application with the usuage of the .NET windows forms packages.

projects.title: Bug Smasher Game
projects.bodyText:
- A Javascript based game that allows you to smash bug with a live score, speed and reset buttons
 - Uses the **Canvas** architecture for the basic logic.
